title: Pick up your very own Mystery Champion!

replies.body: when will we recieve the rest of our mystery skins i only recieved 1 and i bought more than 12

Should be all out by the end of the day.  There was a slight snag, but that's been fixed and they should be all rolling out.  If you got more than one, keep in mind you'll receive them one at a time because we need to verify that you're eligible every time, so it might be a few hours between each.
I earned 8 Mystery Skins and i received 1 yesterday, 1 today... lets see if i got 1 every day :)
Yeaaaaaah, you bought a LOT of mystery items haha.
what are you talking about?
I was talking to CCJane and acknowledging the massive amount of mystery items they purchased.
I also bought/gifted 12+ mystery skins, i have not received anything :\

All of the gifts on NA should be out within the next few hours (so I'm told.)

If you don't have them by tomorrow morning feel free to write in a ticket and support will check it out.

> [{quoted}](name=Hollymonster,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=y6LAeG1L,comment-id=00020004,timestamp=2015-08-17T20:56:38.231+0000)
>
> Should be all out by the end of the day.  There was a slight snag, but that's been fixed and they should be all rolling out.  If you got more than one, keep in mind you'll receive them one at a time because we need to verify that you're eligible every time, so it might be a few hours between each.

Hey, I got two bonus mystery skins (Sewn Chaos Orianna and Sabretusk Sejuani). I only bought six mystery skins during the deal, so I was wondering if there was an accident and just wanted to make sure I won't be punished for it somehow.

It's possible your account got flagged for 2 when it shouldn't have.  If so, it was likely something that happened on our end.  We don't normally punish people when we add 'too much' of something unless it's super serious or harmful.

So, if that is the case you're in the clear.  Enjoy your skins!
I have notgot any skin ， and i bought more than 18

You got Void Nocturne, Order of the Banana Soraka, and Pulsefire Ezreal all on the 17th.  You should have received the gifting animations, but you could have missed them if you logged out.

If you have any concerns about this further feel free to write in a support ticket [here ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our support team can investigate.
ty for the response {{summoner:31}}
i only got a rammus skin but im still waiting for my other 3 and my friend is waiting for his 1
My luck with this will be worse than mystery skins
what happens if i own all champions already D:
You can't buy one
It's in the store for me and available to purchase but I own all champs. Im too scared to try it (Also too broke).
Maybe it will give you an unreleased champ?
Ao Shin confirmed?
you just end up throwing rp at rito.
So we can buy a mystery champ for our selfs, but we can't buy Graves a cigar?
You could make a series of stories about getting graves a cigar.
I rather not. It would be to sad.
what happens if the champ isnt worth because its a 450
> Mystery Champions cost 490 RP, and guarantee an unowned champion worth 585 RP or more.{{champion:161}}

Why can't I buy mystery champions for IP? Doesn't offering it like this sort of defeat the purpose of dual IP/RP system?

Rito Why?
Picked up Mordekaiser. Not sure if want.

> [{quoted}](name=Ramuhdo,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=y6LAeG1L,comment-id=001c,timestamp=2015-08-17T21:08:08.762+0000)
>
> Picked up Mordekaiser. Not sure if want.

Blasphemy!
But I already have {{champion:110}} , {{champion:18}} , {{champion:133}}, {{champion:22}}  and {{champion:96}} , why would I want another ADC?
i think this would be better if the price was 400 so starting players can get the\is with there stater rp

Very disappointed in this Riot.  Thought I would be able to complete my champion set (I only need 6, and only 2 of them are 975) so I bought some RP, spent the IP I accumulated, and went to buy the mystery champs - all to be told I need to have min 10 still available to use the feature.

That should be clearly stated in the description.  Not happy I spent money today that I could have saved until a skin I wanted dropped later.
I love how nowhere it mentions you can't buy one if you have less than 10 champs left to buy..... That should be mentioned for those of us that try and buy the remaining of our champs this way.

I have bought ten mystery champions. Only one of them were worth 975 ip. From personal experience. I can tell you that these mystery champs are not worth the cause. If your interested in buying champs with rp. Just buy them. Don't waste your time hoping to get a good champ from this.
I own every champ that doesnt cost 4800-6300. So......

Damnit, I got {{champion:25}}. Such luck. XD

Funny because I gave my friend 2 mystery champs and he got 2 975 ones.

Only helps that I get 1 mystery skin when I shoulda gotten 2.
> [Nice try Riot... ;)](http://tinypic.com/view.php?pic=70uycx&s=8#.VdPoMvRkPvw)
I got my first bonus skin almost 36 hours ago but have yet to get the other 2-3. Should i write in a ticket yet, or keep waiting?
{{summoner:4}}  For A Skin!!!
So we can buy a champ, for more than they are when they are on sale, and we don't know which champ we will get? Not worth.
Got meself a {{champion:150}}
Yeah, for a whopping 3 rp more!
I got the master yi skin curse... ! got 3 master yi skin from mystery skinsI unboxed and I just receieve 1 more from riot today..
I bought the mystery champ and riot trolled me again {{champion:48}}
Now i can buy champions with rp and actually say worth :D

AND it turns out that if you have fewer than 10 champs you can't actually buy this chest. Figures I'd spend money to get nothing.

An actual marketer would realize that there's a large portion of the market not wanting to spend money on champs anymore, and when they do buy with rp instead of ip it would be greatly beneficial to the companies bottom line.

On the other hand, a rude marketer would tell you that you can get something, market it without disclaimers, and then when you go to buy it find out there's something stopping you. May even be an illegal practice? You think they do the same for mystery skins?
i have no friends to gift {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}

Soo, I needed a few champions to fill up my roster.  I figured I could just buy the rest with Mystery Champions.  If you have 9 or less champions, you CAN NOT buy anymore Mystery Champions.  It's really lame.

PS: Please add this in the description.  I don't want rp refunded, but I would like you to warn people.
It's in the mystery gifting FAQ. Very clearly stated that there's a minimum for champs and skins unowned.
I got karma.......... :( Karma
